abilities.name: Icathian Surprise
abilities.description: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Kog'Maw  remains active for 4 seconds, becoming unable to basic attack, cast abilities, use summoner spells or activate items while being  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  immune to crowd control and gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration he explodes, dealing 125 − 550 (based on level)  true damage to all nearby enemies.
descriptions: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Kog'Maw  remains active for 4 seconds, becoming unable to basic attack, cast abilities, use summoner spells or activate items while being  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  immune to crowd control and gaining up to  40% bonus movement speed over the duration. At the end of the duration he explodes, dealing 125 − 550 (based on level)  true damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Caustic Spittle
abilities.description: Passive: Kog'Maw gains  bonus attack speed.
descriptions: Passive: Kog'Maw gains  bonus attack speed.
Active: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive ball of spit in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits and reducing their  armor and  magic resistance for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
abilities.description: Active: For the next 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain  bonus range and deal bonus magic damage on-hit against non- structures, capped at 100 against  minions and  monsters.
abilities.leveling:
Bonus Range:130 / 150 / 170 / 190 / 210
Bonus Magic Damage:3 / 3.75 / 4.5 / 5.25 / 6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
levelings:
Bonus Range:130 / 150 / 170 / 190 / 210
Bonus Magic Damage:3 / 3.75 / 4.5 / 5.25 / 6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
descriptions: Active: For the next 8 seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain  bonus range and deal bonus magic damage on-hit against non- structures, capped at 100 against  minions and  monsters.

abilities.name: Void Ooze
abilities.description: Active: Kog'Maw spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
descriptions: Active: Kog'Maw spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
The ooze lingers for 4 seconds,  slowing all enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Living Artillery
abilities.description: Active: Kog'Maw launches a ball of acid into the air that drops after 0.6 seconds at the target location, dealing magic damage, increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health), and  revealing enemies hit for 2 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:»100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 (+ 65% bonus AD) (+ 35% AP)«Increased Magic Damage:»150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+ 97.5% bonus AD) (+ 52.5% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 (+ 130% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage:»100 / 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 (+ 65% bonus AD) (+ 35% AP)«Increased Magic Damage:»150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 (+ 97.5% bonus AD) (+ 52.5% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:200 / 240 / 280 / 320 / 360 (+ 130% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP)
descriptions: Active: Kog'Maw launches a ball of acid into the air that drops after 0.6 seconds at the target location, dealing magic damage, increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health), and  revealing enemies hit for 2 seconds.
Living Artillery's damage is  doubled against enemies below  40% maximum health. Each subsequent Living Artillery within the next 8 seconds costs an additional  40 mana, capping at 400 per cast.

name: Kog'Maw
title: the Mouth of the Abyss
blurb: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it...
